infotexts.entitydescription.ek_chaingunammoheavy: Ammunition for the chaingun. High Explosive Fragmentation Composite shells with immense stopping power against soft and hard targets alike.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_chaingunammoheavy_l: Ammunition for the chaingun. High Explosive Fragmentation Composite shells with immense stopping power against soft and hard targets alike.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_coilgunammoboxheavy: Ammunition for the coilgun. High Explosive Fragmentation Composite shells with immense stopping power against soft and hard targets alike.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_coilgunammoheavy_la: Ammunition for the coilgun. High Explosive Fragmentation Composite shells with immense stopping power against soft and hard targets alike.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_coilgunammohighvelo: Ammunition for the coilgun. High-velocity composite shells.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_pulselaserplasmaamm: A pulse laser cartridge that instead generates helical bolts of plasma. Allows for greater damage but reduces its effective range.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_depthcharge_contain: A pressure resistant container designed to be compatible with most systems capable of launching depth charges. Useful for safely disposing of hazardous materials or delivering supplies quicky to the outside of the submarine.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_decoy: An experimental lure and countermeasure platform, shell comes to rest after traveling about 100m and emits a sonar beacon able to distract most monsters.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_nuclearde: An experimental lure and countermeasure platform, shell comes to rest after traveling about 100m and emits a sonar beacon able to distract most monsters.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_flechette: A specialized railgun shell that when fired bursts into multiple piercing projectiles.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_homing: A highly advanced railgun shell with thermal tracking and guidance system, will automatically track to nearby hostile life forms when fired.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_nuclearho: A highly advanced railgun shell with thermal tracking and guidance system, will automatically track to nearby hostile life forms when fired.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_flak: A railgun shell designed with multiple outward-facing explosive charges that detonate in sequence. Produces shockwaves capable of rupturing the internal organs of most small creatures, and significantly disorienting larger ones.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_flak_smar: A railgun shell designed with multiple outward-facing explosive charges that detonate in sequence. Produces shockwaves capable of rupturing the internal organs of most small creatures, and significantly disorienting larger ones.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_piercings: A railgun shell with a kinetic armor-piercing core.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_armorpier: A railgun shell equipped with an advanced shaped-charge penetrating warhead.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_depthcharge_radiati: Experimental depth charge shell equipped with a high-energy radiation emitter. Use of this device in combat is considered a war-crime under coalition law.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_flare: A flare projection solution in railgun shell form. When fired, it creates a short line of flares.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_incendiar: A railgun shell equipped with an incendiary warhead.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_highveloc: A railgun shell with a flat, long-range trajectory.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_depthcharge_cyanide: Depth charge equipped with a payload of cyanide, which disperses into the surrounding water shortly after firing.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_depthcharge_paralyz: Depth charge equipped with a payload of paralyzant, which disperses into the surrounding water shortly after firing.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_depthcharge_radioto: Depth charge equipped with a payload of radiotoxin, which disperses into the surrounding water shortly after firing.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_depthcharge_flare: A flare projection solution in depth-charge form. When fired, it creates a short line of flares.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_depthcharge_chaff: Passive sonar countermeasure in depth-charge form. Disperses a cloud of sonar-disrupting material in a large area.
infotexts.entitydescription.ek_railshell_chaff: Passive sonar countermeasure in railgun shell form. Disperses a cloud of sonar-disrupting material in a large area.
